alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Eastern San Fernando Valley; Malibu Coast; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western San Fernando Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 06 at 1:57PM PST until January 07 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM PST SUNDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected. For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Ventura County Valleys, Malibu Coast, Western San Fernando Valley, Eastern San Fernando Valley and Southeastern Ventura County Valleys. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 1 AM PST Sunday. For the High Wind Warning, from 1 AM to 7 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Eastern San Fernando Valley; Malibu Coast; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western San Fernando Valley
